name: Wa-Tor
body:
### Welcome to Wa-Tor

![Wator Screen](http://www.danielkueffer.com/wator-screen.png)

Wa-Tor is a predator-prey simulation first presented in the December 1984 issue of Scientific American  in a 5-page article.

This is a Wa-Tor implementation developed in Java with various settings with which you can simulate specific population scenarios.

Read more on the [Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wa-Tor) page.

### Download
- All platforms (executable jar file): [DK-Wator.jar](https://github.com/danielkueffer/dk-wator/raw/master/bin/DK-Wator.jar)
- Windows (exe file): [DK-Wator.exe](https://github.com/danielkueffer/dk-wator/raw/master/bin/DK-Wator.exe)

### Manual
Just download the jar or the exe file and double click to run the simulation. There is no installation required.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the simulation or found something to improve? Open a issue on the GitHub Page or send me a mail to daniel.kueffer@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
